original_title: Sajith vows disciplinary actions against members attempting to divide SJB
original_body_lines: Those party members who try to divide and destroy the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) will be brought before a disciplinary Committee, Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa said over the weekend.
"There should be discipline within the SJB which is the sole alternative to the present government,” Premadasa said in a special statement.

“A conspiracy is on to divide and destroy the SJB. There have been no discussions within the party to support President Ranil Wickremesinghe. We don't want to associate with their relative’s party and their relatives media,” he said. (Yohan Perera)
